ygData.subject: Change in Resistance?
ygData.msgSnippet: Am I imagining things or has anyone else been getting an ungodly amount of resists.  Things that 2 days ago I could charm, fear, or chain with now problem were
ygData.messageBody:
Am I imagining things or has anyone else been getting
an ungodly amount of resists. Things that 2 days ago
I could charm, fear, or chain with now problem were
now getting 3 or 4 resists in a row. Things like
lizard men in cazic and aviaks out at KFC (Karana
Fried Chicken). All things that conned blue to me,
but were seemingly unimpressed with my vocal a talent.
Am I out of my mind? I didn't have any charisma
items one (except for my veil) so my charisma was only
95. Could that be it?

On a more humourous note, I was passing through the
Rathe Mountains and saw that big skele so I chamed
him, he was standing by an orc shaman so I told him to
attack it. The fought, the charm wore off, and before
the skele came at me, the shaman cast SOW on it.
Couldn't believe it. So I recharmed the skele who
then made short work of the shaman. Me and my pet ran
down the road where couple of trolls where camping
lizard men. As soon as they heard the big feet o
stompin, they scattered. Had to send them a tell to
let them know he was my pet. My biggest complaint
about the charm song is that it's so freakin fun that
I spend 50% more time goofing off. Oh well. One more
question, do you not get exp for a creature your pet
kills? Twice I had a rook kill another rook and got no
exp for it.


Llewrend Lynnhaven
"I level like old dwarves make love, slow and sloppy"
